```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(hflights)
library(tidyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("spotify_songs.csv")
head(df)
glimpse(df)
summary(df)

genre_factors <- table(df$playlist_genre)
genre_factors

df$playlist_genre <- factor(df$playlist_genre)

df


```


genre - energy
```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x = playlist_genre, y = energy, fill = playlist_genre)) +
  geom_boxplot(color = "black", outlier.shape = 1, outlier.size = 3, notch = TRUE) +
  labs(title = "Energy Distribution Across Playlist Genre", x = "Playlist Genre", y = "Energy") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#1DB954", "#1DB954", "#1DB954", "#1DB954", "#1DB954", "#1DB954")) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") 


```


```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x = danceability, y = track_popularity, color = energy)) +
  geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.7) +
  scale_color_gradient(low = "blue", high = "red") +
  labs(title = "Popularity vs. Danceability",
       x = "Danceability",
       y = "Track Popularity",
       color = "Energy") +
  theme_minimal()
```
